title: Dinnerbone：全面着手Minecraft1.9的开发
author: 北美路人
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2015-1-17 20:26 编辑 
Dinnerbone：I'm totally working on Minecraft 1.9 right now. #TweetsThatDontReallyTellYouMuchAtAll
晚餐骨：我现在真的在做Minecraft 1.9 了。#这些推文就算你看了也没什么用


Back when we added the Wither, he'd always crash the JRE when we touched him & we never knew why. Once again, I changed his code & crash… :(
回到当初我们添加凋零的时候，当我们一碰它，它就老是会让JRE崩溃，而且我们从来也不知道为什么。 我再一次改动了它的代码，然后游戏又崩了..... :(


The really weird thing is - and this was true back then too - even after I revert any changes he goes back to crashing. It's crazy.
最奇怪的是 -- 这可是真事喔。 就算之后我恢复了所有的改动，但凋零还是一直崩溃。太扯了啦这。


I think I need to sacrifice a chicken or something, I basically can't develop now until the curse wears off :( 
我觉得我需要用一只鸡来献祭或者做些什么事情。 直到诅咒消散之时，即是我继续开发游戏之日。 :(


As to why I was poking around in the Wither, he has something that I needed which will be important to my 1.9 plans.
这就是我关注凋零的原因，另外它也是我的1.9更新计划里很重要的一份子。


My idea for 1.9 is something I've wanted to add for years now, but never got the time. I'll be so happy if I pull this off successfully.
我长年一直想在1.9加入许多新鲜的东西，但我从来都没有时间。 如果我能成功地把这事办妥，我真的会很开心的。
